name: Just Orbit
tag_list: travel-company, travel-planning-tool, vacation-ideas, travel-reviews, holiday-suggestions, vacation-planning, travel-ideas, travel-and-tourism
overview:
Just Orbit is a unique travel planning portal that has some unique and innovative features using which people can plan their vacation own their own in manner that is not just hassle free but fun too . With the features that Just Orbit has, travelers can get a virtual tour of their vacation even before embarking on the journey as the site has features with the help of which travel routes can be created, distances between cities can be seen, reviews about hotels, popular attractions and even cities can be scanned through and most important of all a well thought out itinerary can be created. As such www.justorbit.com offers comprehensive travel information across various verticals that is presented in a very easy to use and interactive manner.

Just Orbit has added the latest feature of Travel Suggestions to make the travel planning experience all the more exciting. With this unique feature, travelers can actually get an idea of the cities that they might want to include in their itinerary when planning a trip to a certain country or even continent as these recommendations also come with data and figures that the Just Orbit team has collated after extensive research. These suggestions show the percentage of people who prefer visiting a given city and with that an insight into the popularity of that city. Just Orbit gives its viewers some useful insights into the stats that help them select between the preferred destinations based on popular choice and the suggestions are placed on the page in a way that will easily grab the attention of the viewers. If planning to visit any city in Europe, South America or Australia, viewers can take help of these suggestions right away.
